tags: *Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
full_summary:
### Title {#title}

12-3172016:NSN STRAPPING

### Request for Tender {#rfp}

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for NSN 12-3172016:strapping.

### Items to be Delivered {#items}

*   950 units of **STRAPPING** (GSIN: N5340, Part No: 102, NCAGE: C4080, KLEIN, GUENTHER INDUSTRIEBEDARF, Part No.: GK000000101001, Unit of Issue: RL) to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.
*   150 units of **STRAPPING** (GSIN: N5340, Part No: 102, NCAGE: C4080, KLEIN, GUENTHER INDUSTRIEBEDARF, Part No.: GK000000101001, Unit of Issue: RL) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

### Tender Information {#tender}

*   Tender Number: PW-22-01009250
*   Solicitation Number: W8482-229477/B
*   Tender Closing Date: 20 October 2022 at 14:00:00
*   Tender Status: Expired
*   Zones of Delivery: Nova Scotia, British Columbia, Canada
*   Official Languages: English and French
*   Tender Evaluation Criteria: The contract will be awarded based on the evaluation of financial and technical bid responses.
*   Trade Agreement: Coverage under the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

### Documents and Attachments {#documents}

*   RFP Package can be found at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/05/cfba112444159625d1de49d39aa93186/w8482-229477_english_rfp_clauses.pdf 
*   French RFP Package can be found at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/05/29c5f8b52541c8feb86979a55275eb46/w8482-229477_french_rfp_clauses.pdf

### Technical and Contracting Details {#technical}

*   This procurement is subject to a preference for Canadian Goods and/or Services.
*   Suppliers must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
*   Bidders proposing an Equivalent or Substitute Product
